description: This tender beef barbacoa is the ultimate taco or burrito filling with smoky chipotle and zingy lime.
name: Slow Cooker Beef Barbacoa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium red onions, peeled and sliced
2 cups beef stock, made with 1 stock cube
1 bunch coriander, fresh, chopped, stalks included

recipeInstructions.text: Place the brisket, chipotle paste, onions, garlic, lime juice and zest, vinegar and beef stock in the slow cooker, stir in half of the coriander and the stalks and stir well.
Cook on high for 2 hours, stir and reduce the heat to low for 4 hours, until the meat pulls apart easily. Serve scattered with fresh coriander.
